Watchdocs¶

class watchdocs.document_trace_handler.DocumentTraceHandler(doc_index_path, filter_docs)¶

DocumentTraceHandler is event handler for API Document files.

is_index_file(file_name)¶

Check index file. If index file, return True, Else return False.

Parameters:file_name – file name
Returns:True or False
on_modified(event)¶

Event handler about modified. If raise modify on api document file or index file such as index.json, enqueue event to DocumentTraceQueue.

Parameters:event – the event about event handler
class watchdocs.document_trace_queue.DocumentTraceQueue¶

Queue of modification, inserted, deleted document.

class Singleton¶

Singleton Base Class

Example:

class DocumentTraceQueue(object):
    from common import Singleton
    __metaclass__ = Singleton
DocumentTraceQueue.clear()¶

Remove all trace_queue :return:

DocumentTraceQueue.count()¶

Count of trace_queue :return: count

DocumentTraceQueue.dequeue()¶

Dequeue event Return the copy of top event in trace_queue

Returns:event
DocumentTraceQueue.enqueue(event, is_index_file)¶

Enqueue event to trace_queue

Parameters:
  • event – insert/update/del event
  • is_index_file – True or False
DocumentTraceQueue.is_empty()¶

Is empty trace_queue? :return: True or False

watchdocs.watch_api_doc.start_watch(doc_path, doc_index_path, filter_docs)¶

Start watch docs

Parameters:
  • doc_path – API Document Directory path
  • doc_index_path – API Document index path
  • filter_docs – Document file list ORDER in index.json
watchdocs.watch_api_doc.stop_watch()¶

Stop watch docs
